domain.name: Political Body
domain.description: A section of a government, like The Supreme Court

entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
@WhiteHouse Giant Toddler:
"We're going to get it done very quickly, very easily"

Like the deficit, the national debt and infrastructure?  Like #COVID19???  It's all going to go away very quickly

Just how stupid is the @GOP for buying this SH!T?
#TrumpOwnsEveryDeath 115,000 and counting
